title: Australia chasing 245 to beat England: Women’s Cricket World Cup – live
summary: Two undefeated teams face off in Indore, creating anticipation for a thrilling match. Writers will provide live updates and insights throughout the game. Stay tuned for comprehensive coverage of this competitive showdown.

title: UK inflation stays at 3.8% as food price rises slow for first time since March – as it happened
summary: Recent inflation data increases the likelihood of an interest rate cut in December. As a result, gold prices have risen following their largest sell-off in five years. Investors are reacting to the potential shift in monetary policy.

title: ‘Just extraordinary’: Louvre visitors marvel at jewellery heist as museum reopens
summary: Apollo Gallery remains closed while police investigate a €88 million robbery. The gallery's director is being questioned regarding its security measures. Authorities are working to gather information and evidence related to the heist.

title: From New Girl to Colin from Accounts: your favourite TV romcoms ever
summary: Guardian readers have voted for the TV show featuring the greatest onscreen kiss of all time, highlighting its impact on romantic relationships. One particular kiss is credited with even saving a marriage. The list showcases various beloved romantic comedies cherished by fans.

title: Fresh blow for grooming gangs inquiry ex-police chief pulls out of running to be chair – UK politics live
summary: Victims of grooming gangs claim that the government is trying to pressure them into expanding a national inquiry. They argue that this manipulation undermines the seriousness of their experiences. The victims are calling for a more focused investigation into their specific cases.
